H

hanoi - Variable in class org.bishopireton.hanoi.HanoiGraphics
a reference to the methods that run the game
hanoi(int, int, int, int) - Method in class org.bishopireton.hanoi.Hanoi
a recursive method that moves a tower of disks to the spare spindle then moves the remaining disk to the to spindle, imitating the towers of hanoi challenge - uses a base case for an even and odd number of disks
Hanoi - Class in org.bishopireton.hanoi
The Hanoi class is the class that allows the Towers of Hanoi game to run.
Hanoi() - Constructor for class org.bishopireton.hanoi.Hanoi
Instantiates the game
hanoiGraphics - Variable in class org.bishopireton.hanoi.Hanoi
Object for the graphics of the game, used to move disks and lod the game
HanoiGraphics - Class in org.bishopireton.hanoi
displays the Towers of Hanoi Graphics and allows user to choose starting spindle and number of disks
HanoiGraphics(Hanoi) - Constructor for class org.bishopireton.hanoi.HanoiGraphics
instantiates the GUI for the Towers game \
HEIGHT - Static variable in class org.bishopireton.hanoi.Disk
standard disk height
HEIGHT - Static variable in class org.bishopireton.hanoi.Spindle
How tall to draw the spindles based on maximum disks and disk height/spacing
